parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the status of an objective that was defined in [[Briefing.html|briefing.html]].

Status may be one of:
* "ACTIVE"
* "FAILED"
* "DONE"
* "HIDDEN"

To refer to an objective that is named "OBJ_1", for example, use only the index number in this command (i.e. "1" objStatus "HIDDEN").
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> objectivenumber '''objStatus''' status </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> objectivenumber: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> status: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"1" [[objStatus]] "DONE"</code> 
Marks the objective named "OBJ_1" as completed. </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
